insert into spend_data
id,
spend_type,
money,
task_id,
remark,
proposer_id,
create_time,
status,
#{id},
#{spendType},
#{money},
#{taskId},
#{remark},
#{proposerId},
#{createTime},
#{status},
mapper.select: select s.id, s.spend_type, s.money, s.task_id, s.remark, s.proposer_id, s.create_time, s.status, t.name as taskName from spend_data s left join task t on s.task_id = t.id where proposer_id = #{id} order by s.create_time DESC

select s.id, s.spend_type, s.money, s.task_id, s.remark, s.proposer_id, s.create_time, s.status, t.name as taskName, u.name as proposerName from spend_data s left join task t on s.task_id = t.id left join `user` u on u.id = s.proposer_id where s.status = #{status}

select s.id, s.spend_type, s.money, s.task_id, s.remark, s.proposer_id, s.create_time, s.status, s.approver_id, t.name as taskName, u.name as proposerName, us.name as approverName from spend_data s left join task t on s.task_id = t.id left join `user` u on u.id = s.proposer_id left join `user` us on us.id = s.approver_id order by s.create_time DESC
